original_text:
he has filled the hungry with good things,
    and the rich he has sent away empty.
korean_text: 주리는 자를 좋은 것으로 배불리셨으며 부자는 빈 손으로 보내셨도다

sentences.original_text: he has filled the hungry with good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주린 자들을 좋은 것으로 채웠다

sentences.original_text: the rich he has sent away empty
